snippet.title: Balatro - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Balatro is a roguelike deckbuilding poker game developed by LocalThunk. Players will utilize illegal poker hands, discover game-changing jokers, and string intricate combos together to reign supreme. The game is fitted with an in-depth campaign mode with 8 difficulty modes alongside challenge, daily, and seeded runs. Balatro is available now for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#Gaming #Balatro #IGN
